package.description: High-level executive using teer, the task execution environment for robotics, from ETHZ ASL. Teer is a Python library proposing the use of co-routines (called tasks) to implement executives. Teer is an alternative to executives based on state machines such as smach. This package extends teer with ROS-based time and protects teer tasks using a threading.Condition.
